name: JFrogBuildScan
description:
Scan a build with JFrog Xray.
The scanned build must be published to Artifactory prior to scanning, using the 'JFrog Publish Build Info' task.
author: JFrog

inputs.name: xrayConnection
inputs.label: Xray service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Xray service to be used by this task. (This functionality requires version 3.37.0 or above of JFrog Xray)

inputs.name: buildName
inputs.label: Build name
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Build name to scan.
To use the default build name of the pipeline, set the field to '$(Build.DefinitionName)'.
The build should already be published to Artifactory.

inputs.name: buildNumber
inputs.label: Build number
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Build number to scan.
To use the default build number of the pipeline, set the field to '$(Build.BuildNumber)'.
The build should already be published to Artifactory.

inputs.name: allowFailBuild
inputs.label: Allow fail build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Uncheck if you do not wish to fail the build, following rules with 'Fail Build' actions.

inputs.name: vuln
inputs.label: Show all vulnerabilities
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true if you'd like to receive all vulnerabilities, regardless of the policy configured in Xray. (This functionality requires version 3.40.0 or above of JFrog Xray)
